00018 /*
00019  * Data_Formatter.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *  Created on: 11-Jan-2011
00023  *      
00024  */
00025 
00026 #ifndef DATA_FORMATTER_H_
00027 #define DATA_FORMATTER_H_
00028 
00029 #include "WordIndexDictionary.h"
00030 
00031 //!An interface for formatter objects
00032 /** A formatter is an object that
00033  * converts raw text corpus into
00034  * binary so that its disk footprint
00035  * is low and there is no parsing
00036  * involved while reading it back
00037  */
00038 class Data_Formatter {
00039 public:
00040     //!Perform the actual formatting
00041     virtual void format() = 0;
00042 
00043     //!Return the dictionary being used by the formatter
00044     virtual WordIndexDictionary& get_dictionary() = 0;
00045 
00046     //!The number of documents formatted
00047     virtual int get_num_docs() = 0;
00048 
00049     //!The total number of words found
00050     virtual int get_total_num_words() = 0;
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif /* DATA_FORMATTER_H_ */
